title: Milan Ferdian, Plany Kolejist.pdf
description:
Great publication from Czech republic (Czech Language!) from great author: Milan Ferdian, he is mark of quality in Czech and Slovak republic,
this publication is aim to exactly model railways behind iron curtain, very detail model plans, everyone hand painted!
very rare publication!
now is impossibile to buy any one!
I hope in this way will catch you hearts from all over the world!

In this first publication, author aims readerÃ‚Â´s attention to learn how is railways in Czechoslovakia constructed, how rules are used for stations in Ã„Å’SD network builded, how can this rules use in modelrailways planing and building.

130 pages
layouts in H0 scale, TT scale and N scale

Book is split to three main parts and twelve sub parts:

Obsah (Content):
- uvod (preface)
- logika kruhu (circle logic)
- dopravny (conveyer)
- vÃƒÂ½topny (roundhouses)

Kolejiste (Trackage)
- mala (small)
- stredni (medium)
- dlouhe (long)
- uzkokojene (narrow)
- 1435/760mm (both gauges in one plan!)
- pokojove (room as layout)
- tvar L (L layout)

Volny list (flyleaf)
- pripojna stanice s lokomotivnim depem (docking bay with locomotive depot)
